caseStudies.title: Nesto
caseStudies.description: We developed a digital mortgage platform for Nesto that streamlines the entire process with real-time rate comparisons, application tracking, and personalised guidance.
caseStudies.results: Streamlined mortgage process, real-time rate comparisons

caseStudies.title: PostScrypt Phase 1
caseStudies.description: PostScrypt is a secure digital platform that allows users to create, store, and manage their wills online.

caseStudies.title: PostScrypt Phase 2
caseStudies.description: Our platform offers three smart ways to capture personal memories: AI-powered chats saved as a digital archive, online meetings where the bot attends and generates a booklet, and recorded or uploaded interviews that are automatically converted into a structured digital booklet.

caseStudies.title: Healthcare Mobile App Development
caseStudies.description: Developed a HIPAA-compliant mobile application for patient management, improving appointment scheduling efficiency by 80% and patient satisfaction scores.

caseStudies.title: Financial Services API Integration
caseStudies.description: Built secure API integrations for multiple banking partners, enabling real-time transaction processing and reducing processing time by 50%.

caseStudies.title: Education Platform Modernization
caseStudies.description: Modernized legacy education management system with improved user experience, supporting over 50,000 students and 2,000 faculty members.

caseStudies.title: IoT Smart Manufacturing Solution
caseStudies.description: Implemented IoT sensors and data analytics platform for smart manufacturing, reducing downtime by 35% and increasing production efficiency.

caseStudies.title: Content Delivery Network Optimization
caseStudies.description: Optimized CDN strategy for a media streaming service, reducing bandwidth costs by 40% while improving global content delivery speeds.

caseStudies.title: Real Estate Platform Development
caseStudies.description: Built a comprehensive real estate platform with virtual property tours, automated valuation models, and CRM integration for 500+ agents.

caseStudies.title: Supply Chain Management System
caseStudies.description: Developed an end-to-end supply chain management system with real-time tracking, automated inventory management, and predictive analytics.

caseStudies.title: Cybersecurity Enhancement Project
caseStudies.description: Implemented comprehensive security measures including penetration testing, vulnerability assessments, and multi-factor authentication across platforms.
